name: 24K Gold Glowing Gel
one_line_summary: Cooling Ayurvedic gel that calms, clears, and deeply hydrates skin.
ingredients: Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Aqua (Water), Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Niacinamide, Azelaic Acid, Centella Asiatica Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Azadirachta Indica (Neem) Leaf Extract, Ocimum Sanctum (Tulsi) Leaf Extract, Rubia Cordifolia (Manjistha) Root Extract, Emblica Officinalis (Amla) Fruit Extract, Glycerin, Sodium PCA, Propylene Glycol, Carbomer, Triethanolamine, Menthol, D-Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5), Sodium Hyaluronate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Disodium EDTA, Natural Fragrance (Herbal-Mint Blend)
benefits_brief: A modern Ayurvedic blend for instant calm, clarity, and skin renewal. Product Benefits Instant Cooling Relief: Menthol, cucumber, and peppermint extracts deliver a refreshing cooling sensation that calms irritation, redness, and heat-triggered sensitivity.
benefits_detail: A modern Ayurvedic blend for instant calm, clarity, and skin renewal. Product Benefits Instant Cooling Relief: Menthol, cucumber, and peppermint extracts deliver a refreshing cooling sensation that calms irritation, redness, and heat-triggered sensitivity.
use_cases: Post-sun soothing gel; Daily hydration gel; After shave or wax relief; Acne & redness control treatment; Post-treatment recovery gel; Cooling night gel; After-workout or travel refresh. How to use: Apply a small amount to clean, dry skin and massage until absorbed. Use AM & PM or as needed.

name: 24K Gold Elixir Face Oil Serum
one_line_summary: Featherlight elixir that firms, brightens and nourishes for timeless glow.
ingredients: Squalane (Olive Derived), Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grapeseed) Seed Oil, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Seed Oil, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Oil, Withania Somnifera (Ashwagandha) Root Extract, Rubia Cordifolia (Manjistha) Root Extract, Centella Asiatica (Gotu Kola) Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Lactic Acid, Mandelic Acid, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Oil, Boswellia Carterii (Frankincense) Oil, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract (Natural Antioxidant), Natural Fragrance (Botanical Blend).
benefits_brief: Boosts natural radiance & glow; Firms & tightens the skin; Deep nourishment, zero greasiness; Reduces pigmentation & uneven tone; Strengthens skin barrier & prevents aging damage; Soothes stress & balances skin energy; Ayurvedic + modern synergy.
benefits_detail: Boosts natural radiance & glow; Firms & tightens the skin; Deep nourishment, zero greasiness; Reduces pigmentation & uneven tone; Strengthens skin barrier & prevents aging damage; Soothes stress & balances skin energy; Ayurvedic + modern synergy.
use_cases: Night repair elixir; Morning glow booster; Anti-aging ritual; Daily brightening treatment; Facial massage & Gua Sha oil; Travel or post-stress skin reviver; Mix-in enhancer. How to use: Warm 2–3 drops between palms and press onto cleansed face and neck, AM/PM.

name: Glow Skin Toner
one_line_summary: Milky hydra-bright toner that plumps, evens tone, and soothes sensitive skin.
ingredients: Aqua (Distilled Water), Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Water, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Extract, Niacinamide (Vitamin B3), Sodium PCA, Hyaluronic Acid, Ascorbyl Glucoside (Vitamin C), Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Squalane (Olive-derived), Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Lipid, Lecithin, Polysorbate 20, Cetearyl Glucoside, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil / Rosa Damascena Oil / Santalum Album (Sandalwood) Oil [optional fragrance], Dehydroacetic Acid & Benzyl Alcohol (Eco-certified preservative).
benefits_brief: Hydrates deeply without stickiness; Brightens & revives dull complexion; Strengthens skin barrier; Soothes & calms sensitive skin; Soft, milky texture for everyday luxury; Daily glow ritual.
benefits_detail: Hydrates deeply without stickiness; Brightens & revives dull complexion; Strengthens skin barrier; Soothes & calms sensitive skin; Soft, milky texture for everyday luxury; Daily glow ritual.
use_cases: Use after cleansing and before serum or moisturizer, AM & PM. Best for all skin types, especially dry, dull, sensitive, and acne-prone; ideal for hot, humid climates or post-sun exposure.

name: Intense Brightening Elixir Face Serum
one_line_summary: Potent brightening serum that fades spots, evens tone, boosts radiance.
ingredients: Vitamin C (Ethyl Ascorbic Acid 10%), Niacinamide (5%), Kojic Acid (2%), Alpha Arbutin (1%), Azelaic Acid (2%), Mandelic Acid (1%), Licorice Root Extract, Turmeric Extract, Gotu Kola Extract, Green Tea Extract, Hyaluronic Acid, Aloe Vera Juice, Panthenol (Vitamin B5), Allantoin, Sodium PCA, Glycerin (plant-derived), Aqua (Distilled Water), Xanthan Gum (Natural Thickener), Phenoxyethanol & Ethylhexylglycerin (Eco-certified preservative), Natural Essential Oils for mild fragrance
benefits_brief: Fades pigmentation & dark spots; Evens out skin tone; Boosts radiance & hydration; Antioxidant protection; Gentle skin renewal.
benefits_detail: Fades pigmentation & dark spots; Evens out skin tone; Boosts radiance & hydration; Antioxidant protection; Gentle skin renewal.
use_cases: Use day and night after cleansing & toning, before moisturizer. Apply 2–3 drops on clean, damp skin and follow with SPF in the morning. Great for dull, pigmented, or uneven skin tone and acne marks.

name: Tivra Skin Peeling Oil
one_line_summary: Gentle overnight peel that resurfaces, brightens and softens skin.
ingredients: Jojoba Oil, Olive-derived Squalane, Rosehip Seed Oil, Turmeric Extract, Glycolic Acid (from Sugarcane), Malic Acid (from Apple Extract), Lactic Acid, Licorice Root Extract, Aloe Vera Extract, Vitamin C (Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate), Lemon Peel Oil, Chamomile Essential Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Natural Preservative.
benefits_brief: Natural exfoliation; Brightens and evens skin tone; Smooth texture & instant radiance; Restores glow naturally; Calms and soothes.
benefits_detail: Natural exfoliation; Brightens and evens skin tone; Smooth texture & instant radiance; Restores glow naturally; Calms and soothes.
use_cases: Night-only treatment, 1–2 times a week. Apply 4–5 drops on clean, dry skin, leave overnight, and rinse next morning. Patch test first; avoid use on broken skin or with other strong exfoliants.

name: Sunscreen SPF50
one_line_summary: Ultra-light SPF50 that shields, hydrates, and calms skin with zero white cast.
ingredients: Aqua (Distilled Water), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (Aloe Vera), Niacinamide, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Octocrylene, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane (Avobenzone), Benzophenone-3, BHT, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Extract, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Allantoin, Xanthan Gum, Gluconolactone (and) Sodium Benzoate (Geogard Ultra), Fragrance (Natural), Lactic Acid (for pH adjustment).
benefits_brief: High sun protection; Hydration without stickiness; No white cast; Skin soothing & repair; Barrier strengthening.
benefits_detail: High sun protection; Hydration without stickiness; No white cast; Skin soothing & repair; Barrier strengthening.
use_cases: Use every morning after serum and before makeup. Reapply every 3–4 hours when outdoors. Best for all skin types, especially oily & combination, and those who dislike heavy sunscreens.

name: Intense Body Butter
one_line_summary: Fast-absorbing butter that hydrates, repairs barrier and brightens skin.
ingredients: Aqua (Water), Shea Butter, Mango Butter, Cocoa Butter, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Jojoba Oil, Emulsifying Wax, Aloe Vera Extract, Glycerin, Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5), Niacinamide, Vitamin E, Phenoxyethanol, Natural Fragrance
benefits_brief: Non-greasy hydration; Barrier repair & protection; Skin brightening & tone correction; Anti-aging benefits; Soothing & cooling effect.
benefits_detail: Non-greasy hydration; Barrier repair & protection; Skin brightening & tone correction; Anti-aging benefits; Soothing & cooling effect.
use_cases: Apply daily after shower or before bedtime on dry areas like arms, legs, and elbows. Suitable for all skin types, especially dry to combination; ideal after sun exposure or shaving.

name: Rosemary Water Hair Spray
one_line_summary: Daily scalp mist that boosts growth, reduces fall and strengthens.
ingredients: (Water), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Panthenol, Glycerin, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Caffeine, Biotin, Niacinamide, Hydrolyzed Pea Protein, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Water, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Menthol.
benefits_brief: Stimulates hair growth; Strengthens hair shaft; Reduces hair fall & dandruff; Non-sticky, lightweight finish; Natural aromatherapy.
benefits_detail: Stimulates hair growth; Strengthens hair shaft; Reduces hair fall & dandruff; Non-sticky, lightweight finish; Natural aromatherapy.
use_cases: Daily scalp and hair-strengthening mist. Shake well, spray onto scalp and roots, massage for 1–2 minutes, and leave on. Use twice daily for best results.
